title: Mercury Transit in the 6th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Mercuryâ€™s transit through the sixth house sharpens focus on work routines, problem-solving, and practical efficiency. This phase supports analytical tasks, service-oriented roles, and handling disputes with logic. You may become more detail-driven in daily responsibilities and health habits. While this transit favors productivity and strategic thinking, mental strain can arise if you overanalyze minor issues or engage in unnecessary arguments.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Desire to improve systems and routines

sections.heading: Career
points: Good for audits, analysis, and operational work

sections.heading: Finance
points: Focus on clearing dues or liabilities
Gains through service or analytical work

closing: This transit rewards clear thinking applied to real problems. When logic is balanced with patience, efficiency improves steadily.
